H0.text: A thermometer shows that the air temperature is 56°F is the statement that the question asks to identify as an inference.

H1.text: A mineral sample of galena produced a gray‑black streak when tested is the statement that the question presents as an inference.

H2.text: Based on previous data, ten hurricanes may occur in the year 2013 is an inference.

H3.text: A weather vane indicating the wind is coming from the west is an inference.

A4.text: Galena, which can be similar in appearance to hematite, is easily distinguished by its gray streak.
